index.title: Home
index.description: Frontend UI developer Felix Berger from Berlin.
index.aboutContent1: Hello, I'm Felix Berger. I'm an independent UI developer living in Berlin, Germany.
index.aboutContent2: I build inclusive, easy to use and engaging products for the web and I offer 10 years of experience in frontend development.
index.skillsContent1: As a developer with experience working on large scale frontends, I can support your project with performant and modern code. I care about responsibly choosing tools and I am comfortable working in both vanilla and framework environments. To ensure broad access to a digital experience, I apply progressive enhancement techniques and my experiences gathered in over 6 years of WCAG and BITV tested projects.
index.skillsContent2: As a former information architect, I have the ability to bridge the gap between design and implementation. I build maintainable, meaningful structures and interfaces that are both accessible and appealing.
